standard_clauses.red_flag_if: overly broad definition covering all information
standard_clauses.plain_english: Confidential information must be clearly defined and not overly broad.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: गोपनीय जानकारी स्पष्ट रूप से परिभाषित होनी चाहिए।
standard_clauses.template_clause: Confidential Information means information specifically designated as confidential.

standard_clauses.plain_english: NDA obligations should have a reasonable time limit.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: NDA दायित्वों की उचित समय सीमा होनी चाहिए।
standard_clauses.template_clause: Confidentiality obligations shall survive for [X] years after termination.

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: no exceptions for legally required disclosures
standard_clauses.plain_english: NDA must allow disclosure when required by law or court order.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: NDA में कानून या अदालत के आदेश से आवश्यक प्रकटीकरण की अनुमति होनी चाहिए।
standard_clauses.template_clause: Disclosure is permitted when required by applicable law or court order.

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: no provision for return or destruction of confidential materials
standard_clauses.plain_english: On termination, all confidential materials should be returned or destroyed.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: समाप्ति पर सभी गोपनीय सामग्री वापस या नष्ट की जानी चाहिए।
standard_clauses.template_clause: Upon termination, all confidential materials shall be returned or destroyed.
